response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $13,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive offer for you, given the product's intrinsic value to you at $15,000. We are confident that this proposal will be mutually beneficial. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 13500}
